meta.name: ika_dictionary
meta.note: Built strictly from ika_grammar.txt sections (no invented translations).

entries.source_text: If it rains, I will not go.
entries.target_text: omẹni mirin ezue e jẹnkọ m

entries.source_text: If you eat, you will be strong.
entries.target_text: omẹni ye ri ihiẹn oriri ye ze

entries.source_text: If the sun is hot, we will rest.
entries.target_text: omẹni anwụn ekẹrẹn ẹnyin ezu ikẹn

entries.source_text: If you come early, we will leave together.
entries.target_text: omẹni ya bịa ẹgwa ẹnyin awịrị

entries.source_text: If there is no water, boil more.
entries.target_text: omẹni mirin arịa shi mẹ cheni

entries.source_text: There is water in the pot.
There is food on the table.
The man is in the house.
The woman is at the market.
The child is behind the house.
You do not drink palm wine.
He does not go to school.

entries.target_text: kị haịn i gi lẹ ni bịa ẹgwa
